description: “As the Product Owner in the Banco BCI project, achieved a 50% increase in the number of operational users (reaching 2K) and a 95% SNEX score (Customer Satisfaction and Efficiency) following the successful launch of the MVP into production.”
Move forward with a stuck MPV opening up communications and freeing up dependencies with other areas.
Build the first Marketplace for Falabella Chile, managing a $5MM USD budget.
